[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [RushConstants](./rush-lib.rushconstants.md)

## RushConstants class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Constants used by the Rush tool.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RushConstants
```

## Remarks

These are NOT part of the public API surface for rush-lib. The rationale is that we don't want people implementing custom parsers for the Rush config files; instead, they should rely on the official APIs from rush-lib.

## Properties

| Property                                                                                             | Modifiers           | Type       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [artifactoryFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.artifactoryfilename.md)                               | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The artifactory.json configuration file name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [browserApprovedPackagesFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.browserapprovedpackagesfilename.md)       | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("browser-approved-packages.json") for an optional policy configuration file that stores a list of NPM packages that have been approved for usage by Rush projects. This is part of a pair of config files, one for projects that run in a web browser (e.g. whose approval criteria mostly focuses on licensing and code size), and one for everywhere else (e.g. tooling projects whose approval criteria mostly focuses on avoiding node_modules sprawl).    |
| [buildCacheFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.buildcachefilename.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Build cache configuration file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [buildCacheVersion](./rush-lib.rushconstants.buildcacheversion.md)                                   | <code>static</code> | number     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Build cache version number, incremented when the logic to create cache entries changes. Changing this ensures that cache entries generated by an old version will no longer register as a cache hit.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [buildCommandName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.buildcommandname.md)                                     | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the incremental build command.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [bulkCommandKind](./rush-lib.rushconstants.bulkcommandkind.md)                                       | <code>static</code> | 'bulk'     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The value of the "commandKind" property for a bulk command in command-line.json                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [changeFilesFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.changefilesfoldername.md)                           | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("changes") where change files will be stored.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [commandLineFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.commandlinefilename.md)                               | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Custom command line configuration file, which is used by rush for implementing custom command and options.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [commonFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.commonfoldername.md)                                     | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("common") where Rush's common data will be stored.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [commonVersionsFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.commonversionsfilename.md)                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("common-versions.json") for an optional configuration file that stores dependency version information that affects all projects in the repo. This configuration file should go in the "common/config/rush" folder.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [defaultMaxInstallAttempts](./rush-lib.rushconstants.defaultmaxinstallattempts.md)                   | <code>static</code> | number     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Number of installation attempts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [experimentsFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.experimentsfilename.md)                               | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Experiments configuration file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [globalCommandKind](./rush-lib.rushconstants.globalcommandkind.md)                                   | <code>static</code> | 'global'   | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The value of the "commandKind" property for a global command in command-line.json                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [hashDelimiter](./rush-lib.rushconstants.hashdelimiter.md)                                           | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> When a hash generated that contains multiple input segments, this character may be used to separate them to avoid issues like crypto.createHash('sha1').update('a').update('bc').digest('hex') === crypto.createHash('sha1').update('ab').update('c').digest('hex')                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [nodeModulesFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.nodemodulesfoldername.md)                           | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("node_modules") where NPM installs its packages.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [nonbrowserApprovedPackagesFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.nonbrowserapprovedpackagesfilename.md) | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("nonbrowser-approved-packages.json") for an optional policy configuration file that stores a list of NPM packages that have been approved for usage by Rush projects. This is part of a pair of config files, one for projects that run in a web browser (e.g. whose approval criteria mostly focuses on licensing and code size), and one for everywhere else (e.g. tooling projects whose approval criteria mostly focuses on avoiding node_modules sprawl). |
| [npmShrinkwrapFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.npmshrinkwrapfilename.md)                           | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("npm-shrinkwrap.json") used to store an installation plan for the NPM package manger.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [phasedCommandKind](./rush-lib.rushconstants.phasedcommandkind.md)                                   | <code>static</code> | 'phased'   | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The value of the "commandKind" property for a phased command in command-line.json                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [phaseNamePrefix](./rush-lib.rushconstants.phasenameprefix.md)                                       | <code>static</code> | '\_phase:' | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The expected prefix for phase names in "common/config/rush/command-line.json"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [pinnedVersionsFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.pinnedversionsfilename.md)                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("pinned-versions.json") for an old configuration file that that is no longer supported.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [pnpmfileV1Filename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.pnpmfilev1filename.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("pnpmfile.js") used to add custom configuration to PNPM (PNPM version 1.x and later).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [pnpmfileV6Filename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.pnpmfilev6filename.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename (".pnpmfile.cjs") used to add custom configuration to PNPM (PNPM version 6.x and later).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [pnpmV3ShrinkwrapFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.pnpmv3shrinkwrapfilename.md)                     | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("pnpm-lock.yaml") used to store an installation plan for the PNPM package manger (PNPM version 3.x and later).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [projectRushFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.projectrushfoldername.md)                           | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the per-project folder where project-specific Rush files are stored. For example, the package-deps files, which are used by commands to determine if a particular project needs to be rebuilt.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [projectShrinkwrapFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.projectshrinkwrapfilename.md)                   | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the file to drop in project-folder/.rush/temp/ containing a listing of the project's direct and indirect dependencies. This is used to detect if a project's dependencies have changed since the last build.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [rebuildCommandName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rebuildcommandname.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the non-incremental build command.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [repoStateFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.repostatefilename.md)                                   | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("repo-state.json") for a file used by Rush to store the state of various features as they stand in the repo.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [rushLogsFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushlogsfoldername.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the project <code>rush-logs</code> folder.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [rushPackageName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushpackagename.md)                                       | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the NPM package for the Rush tool (" @ microsoft/rush").                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [rushPluginManifestFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushpluginmanifestfilename.md)                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Rush plugin manifest file name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [rushPluginsConfigFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushpluginsconfigfilename.md)                   | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Rush plugins configuration file name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [rushProjectConfigFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushprojectconfigfilename.md)                   | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Per-project configuration filename.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [rushRecyclerFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushrecyclerfoldername.md)                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("rush-recycler") where Rush moves large folder trees before asynchronously deleting them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [rushTempFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushtempfoldername.md)                                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("temp") under the common folder, or under the .rush folder in each project's directory where temporary files will be stored. Example: <code>C:\MyRepo\common\temp</code>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [rushTempNpmScope](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushtempnpmscope.md)                                     | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The NPM scope (" @ rush-temp") that is used for Rush's temporary projects.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [rushTempProjectsFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushtempprojectsfoldername.md)                 | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("projects") where temporary projects will be stored. Example: <code>C:\MyRepo\common\temp\projects</code>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [rushUserConfigurationFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushuserconfigurationfoldername.md)       | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The name of the per-user Rush configuration data folder.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [rushVariantsFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushvariantsfoldername.md)                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The folder name ("variants") under which named variant configurations for alternate dependency sets may be found. Example: <code>C:\MyRepo\common\config\rush\variants</code>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [rushWebSiteUrl](./rush-lib.rushconstants.rushwebsiteurl.md)                                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The URL ("http://rushjs.io") for the Rush web site.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [updateCloudCredentialsCommandName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.updatecloudcredentialscommandname.md)   | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [versionPoliciesFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.versionpoliciesfilename.md)                       | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [yarnShrinkwrapFilename](./rush-lib.rushconstants.yarnshrinkwrapfilename.md)                         | <code>static</code> | string     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename ("shrinkwrap.yaml") used to store state for pnpm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
